text: o buile bogologolo ka Mowa O O Boitshepo ka mogolwagolwane wa rona, motlhanka wa gago Kgosi Dafide, wa re ‘Ke ka ntlha yang fa baheitane ba tsogologela Morena, le merafe e e dieleele e dira maanonyana a a kgatlhanong le Modimo-Mothata-Yotlhe? Dikgosi tsa lefatshe di a kopana go tlhabantsha Morwa Modimo yo o tloditsweng!’
